title: Effortless Integration
description: No need to be an expert in pose estimation. Just plug in PocketPose and start using body, hand, and face motion data instantly.

title: Optimized Performance
description: Designed for mobile and edge devices, ensuring smooth real-time inference without heavy computational requirements.

title: Built for Developers
description: Simple APIs, clear documentation, and an active community to help you bring motion-powered features to your users faster.
